Digital Marketing Bootcamp

Essentials of digital marketing and analytics

Learn Digital Marketing

Essential skills for any marketer or entrepreneur

Our 10 day bootcamp will take you from little to no digital marketing experience to being able to confidently create and track digital campaigns. You'll learn practical skills from experts in the field -- like how to set up advanced google analytics tracking, how to create effecting facebook or instagram ad campaigns and how how to nail google Adwords & SEO.

By the end of the program you will have be ready to create and track digital campaigns across all social platforms!

Course Structure

Practical Projects

Rather than working on hypothetical challenges or studying for arbitrary tests, our students are working on real projects from day one because we know that you learn best by doing.

Personalised Learning

We deliver a personalised curriculum that's tailored to the individual goals of each of our students -- through custom electives, masterminds by the pool and personalised learning.

1 - 4 Mentor Ratio

Languages should be immersive. Forget giant classrooms, we've got only 15 students to 4 experienced mentors so you know you'll have the one-on-one attention you need to thrive.

Latest Technology

Typical universities teach outdated technology in their often stagnant curriculumns. We update our content weekly to deliver the latest tools and technologies.

WHAT YOU WILLLEARN

  • + marketing strategy fundamentals
  • + the digital marketing funnel
  • + configuring Google analytics
  • + tracking campaigns with social analytics
  • + creating social ads on Facebook and Instagram
  • + optimising a website for SEO
  • + a/b testing ad campaigns
  • + generating leads through Google Adwords
  • + boosting traffic with Pinterest
  • + creating effective ad campaigns
}

how to build kickass websites from scratch

Experienced Instructors

We only hire experienced instructors who are actively working in the industry and have a practical knowledge that goes far beyond a textbook. At every session we have 3 experienced mentors and one junior mentor, who are ready to share their skills and experience with you and teach you the best practices and insider tips that you won't learn anywhere else.

The IOC Promise

We have this radical idea that your education doesn't stop when the 10 days end. We've made you a promise, to teach you how to build responsive websites from scratch, so we support you for as long as you need to make that a reality. That means you have lifetime access to our course materials (including future updates!) and ongoing tech support via email, private facebook group and even skype!

Daily Schedule

6am Start your day with sunrise yoga overlooking the rice paddies.

7am Enjoy a delicious breakfast prepared by our in-house chef

8am Class time! Wander over to the classroom and dig in to practical lessons

12am Lunch, a quick dip in the pool, and maybe an ice-coffee

4pm Work one-on-one with the mentors or head out to explore Bali

6pm Mingling with other students over a gourmet meal, can life get any better?

8pm Review the days content or enjoy a cocktail while you watch the sunset

We make our programs all-inclusive so you can kick back, relax and focus on learning. 

  • 100+ hours practical coursework
  • 10 nights accomodation
  • All meals by an in-house chef
  • Daily yoga & mindfulness meditation
  • Excursions & activities
  • 1 hour massage
  • Airport transfer
  • Course materials
  • Ongoing support & Video Tutorials
  • 12 months web hosting

How to Apply

Step 1: Apply

Tell us a little about yourself and why you are interested in joining our course, and we'll give you a call to answer any questions. There is no commitment at this stage, so

Apply Now

Step 2: Enroll

We'll send this through after our skype call. This takes around 15 - 20 minutes to fill in, and we'll get back to you within 48 hours to let you know if you have been accepted into the program.

Step 3: Book

To confirm your enrollment all we need is a $500 deposit. We'll then give you access to the pre-coursework containing exclusive video tutorials, and organise a payment plan for the remaining balance.

All accommodation, meals, coursework and daily activities (like yoga) are included in the price.

YOUR OUTCOMES

You'll come away from one of our digital marketing bootcamps with the skills and confidence to create and analyse digital marketing campaigns. Whether that's setting up google analytics (and being able to interpret and understand the results!) or knowing how the to effectively generate leads and sell products online, this course covers all the things that your marketing degree didn't teach you. You'll be learning the latest tools and technologies, going beyond textbook basics and gaining real insights from experienced mentors who are actively working in the industry. Learn best practices, common trends, and which skills to continue to develop and improve if you want to land the job of your dreams. 

See example projects

GETTING IN THE FLOW STATE

Every element of the program and curriculum was created with an understanding of educational psychology, motivation, and high performance in order to help our students get into the 'flow state' of peak performance.

When you create an environment that motivates and inspires, and take care of all of your students needs then something amazing happens .. they learn really fast

By removing people from the stress of their everyday lives, creating an environment that inspires, and taking care of every one of our students needs then they are able to focus all of their mental energy on learning a new skill.

The Institute of Code

Institute of Code runs 10 day immersive bootcamps on topics like coding and digital marketing in beautiful locations around the world. We create an environment of accelerated learning, so you can learn in demand digital skills while having an experience of a lifetime.
